sub_title: General Manager at CSC-Crewing BV | Recruitment |Shipping | Global Crewing | Leading HR Manager | Country HR Manager
summary: HR professional with leading experience and managing of an HR function. I have a high interest and experience in the latest HR trends. Strong in advising, training and coaching of team, management and professionals. A quick analytical thinker, high performer, decision maker and HR generalist with a “can-do mentality”. Someone with a loyal and serious nature, who is responsible and has a good feel for employee relations, people development and HR processes, who lets people think for themselves, enjoys coaching and advising professionals and is skilled in the implementation, innovation and setup of HR projects from start to finish. My HR experience suits most in an International business environment. I like to be part of the Business and am solution minded and result driven. I have learned to drive for process efficiency and pilot new developments in HR Trends/HR projects. Innovative solutions and motivated people inspire me.

profile_positions.description: Responsible for CSC-Crewing BV, a Dutch based crewing agency. Provide crewing services and supply professionals to maritime and dredging industry worldwide. Own offices in Rotterdam and Vlissingen in The Netherlands, Lithuania and The Philippines and a network of agents around the globe.
profile_positions.title: General Manager

profile_positions.description: Part time- Voluntary | Advisory role to the Board of Directors on Pension fund matters.
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the Accountability Body – Nedlloyd Pension Fund

profile_positions.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES: Leading the HR team responsible for the provision of HR/Manning Office services for 140 Dutch Seafarers and 9  Dutch flag vessels to Maersk Line and Maersk Tanker Business Units. Including HR services, financial reporting and NL flag state representation.

OBJECTIVES: Compensation & Benefits, Employee Retention, Sustainable employability, Employee development, Sea Staff Quality & Engagement and Recruitment & Training, Sea Staff Documentation and Systems Quality, Manning Office Quality, Finance, Full Ownership of Union and OR matters.

SUCCESFUL COMPLETED HR PROJECTS: Phase Out Integrated Dual System to Conventional; Harmonisation 2 CBA’s, Implementation MLC2006, International Employment Contracts, Implementation of sustainable employability and  Competence management for all seafarers within Dutch organization of ML.
profile_positions.title: HR Manager Manning Office Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
For the Regional Europe Organisation (Sales and Service of Marine Products and Systems) consisting of 11 global support network offices and approximately 200 employees.

RESPONSIBILITIES: Implementing and maintain HR Strategies to support the Europe business budget and commitments. Responsible for recruitment for the Europe (service) staff; salary reviews across Europe; headcount reporting; managing and running development cells; managing high potential employee process and succession plans. HR aspects for new established offices in Europe. Support, advice and coaching to 10 Europe Country Managers on HR issues. Supporting HSE processes and policies.

HR PROJECTS: Learning on Line, Harmonisation of Terms and Conditions European Service People. Reporting to the VP Services/Regional Director Europe. Member of the Europe Management Team.
profile_positions.title: Regional HR Advisor Europe

profile_positions.description:
Rolls-Royce Marine Benelux (Sales and Service of Marine Products and systems) in Rotterdam 

Responsibilities: Support the Benelux Management team on strategic and operational issues. Member of Benelux Management team. 
Tasks: Recruitment, lease-car policy, define and implement Terms & Conditions for Service and Sales people, employee benefits, HS&E support, Training plans)
Responsible for Office Management and Receptionist.  
Projects: Harmonisation of Terms & Conditions of Service Engineers group, Set up and professionalize HR, Reorganisation of Rotterdam office after the merge in 2001
profile_positions.title: HR Advisor Benelux/ Office Manager

profile_positions.description:
Life Fitness Benelux B.V., Rotterdam. Supplier of Life Fitness equipment.

Responsible for operational/tactical HR for 25 people (Service- and Sales) and Office Management and PA to Sales Director
Tasks: support and HR advise to Management Team, recruitment, labour contracts, define and implement policies on Terms & Conditions, register and monitor of sick leave, Lease-car policy, employee benefits. Leading a small team (receptionist, secretary)
Projects: Company grown from 10 to 30 people in 3 years. Professionalise HR Support, move to new premises, support set up of Shared Service Organisation for Finance, IT and HR.
profile_positions.title: HR Manager/ PA/ Office Manager
